full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I SPYOD PA LA 'JUG PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @160B BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I SPYOD PA LA 'JUG PA, SLOB DPON SH'AN TI DE BAS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO, ,@161A *, ,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SARBA DZNY'A DE DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZ'A BA BANDE DPAL BRTZEGS KYIS, KHA CHE'I DPE LAS ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA LAS, SLAD KYIS RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO DHARMA SHR'I BHA DRA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZ'A BA BANDHE RIN CHEN BZANG PO DANG, SH'AKYA BLO GROS KYIS YUL DBUS KYI 'GREL PA DANG, MTHUN PAR BCOS SHING BSGYUR TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O, ,YANG DUS PHYIS RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SU MA TI K'I RTI @161B DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZ'A BA DGE SLONG BLO LDAN SHES RAB KYIS DAG PAR BCOS SHING BSGYUR TE LEGS PAR GTAN LA PHAB PA'O, ,DUS GSUM RGYAL BA MA LUS BSKYED PA'I YAB, RGYAL SRAS DAM PA RNAMS KYI THUGS DAM MTHIL, ,MNGON MTHO NGES LEGS PHUN TSOGS KUN GYI GTER, RIN CHEN BYANG CHUB SEMS LA PHYAG 'TSAL NAS, SKAL LDAN THEG MCHOG RIGS CAN SKYE BO @162A *, ,YIS, RLABS CHEN RGYAL SRAS SPYOD LA 'JUG PA'I TSUL, ,DRI MED RIG PAS LEGS PAR BSHAD PA'I GZHUNG, ,MKHAS GRUB KUN GYIS GCIG TU BSNGAGS PA 'DI, ,CHOS SBYIN SPEL PHYIR SPAR DU BSGRUBS PA YIS, RNAM DKAR DGE TSOGS JI SNYED BSAGS PA'I MTHUS, BDAG SOGS DENG NAS TSE RABS THAMS CAD DU, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS @162B DANG 'BRAL BA MED GYUR CIG , ,,'JAM DPAL DBYANGS KYI DGE BA'I BSHES MDZAD NAS, RLABS CHEN SPYOD PA RGYA MTSO'I MTHAR SON TE, SKU BZHI'I BDAG NYID RGYAL BA'I GO 'PHANG THOB, ,MKHA' KHYAB ZHING GI 'GRO BA GROL GYUR CIG , ,,CES PA 'DI YANG MANG THOS RGYAL KHAMS @163A *, ,PA LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJES SMRAS PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS CHOS 'PHEL GLING GI PAR DU GRUB, , ,)
translator_(орчуулагч): DHARMA SHR'I BHA DRA, RIN CHEN BZANG PO, SH'AKYA BLO GROS,
